abstract: Warren E. Buffett has unloaded another 1.35 million shares in Moody’s Corp., but Berkshire Hathaway still controls 12.6 percent of the credit rating firm’s stock.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett has unloaded another 1.35 million shares in Moody’s Corp., but Berkshire Hathaway still controls 12.6 percent of the credit rating firm’s stock.
